name: 11.25 "The Guy Can't Help It" Trivia Game | 'Cheers'- Season 11 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Why was Norm upset in the beginning?
options: The bar was about to close.
questions.explanation:
The beer tap wasn't working.

	He was going crazy waiting for the repair person. Cliff wouldn't share his beer because Sam told them the beer taps would be down for a while. Cliff rationed his beer. When he suggested Norm do the same thing, Norm called him a "bozo".

Tom Berenger.

	Tom Berenger was born Thomas Michael Moore in 1949, in Chicago, Illinois.

questions.correct: Rebecca & Rebecca Howe & Miss Howe & Howe & Miss Rebecca Howe
questions.explanation:
Rebecca & Rebecca Howe & Miss Howe & Howe & Miss Rebecca Howe.

	Rebecca was going on and on about how she wanted a hard working average man. However, she turned Don down at first because he was a plumber.

questions.text: How did Don talk about marriage to Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
With his eyes.

	She was saying she wasn't going to rush things. A few seconds later she was going on about how she loved him.

questions.text: What did Sam say Rebecca deserved?
questions.correct: The greatest guy in the world
questions.explanation:
The greatest guy in the world.

	Sam told her that she was on the top of his list of women to marry. Rebecca was insulted that he basically said he'd marry her if no one better came along.

questions.text: Why did Rebecca say no one would want to marry Sam?
questions.correct: He's been with so many other women.
questions.explanation:
He's been with so many other women.

	She said that woman now laughed at him. When Sam told Frasier, Frasier agreed with Rebecca.

questions.text: How long did Sam go without thinking about sex?
questions.explanation:
1 second.

	He told Frasier he could go as long as he wanted. He asked Frasier if 1 second was normal. Frasier replied, "For a rabbit!"

questions.text: When Sam asked Carla if she'd marry him what did she say?
options: Not if you were the last man on earth
questions.explanation:
Not in a million years.

	Carla thought that Sam would not remain faithful. She said he was a hound.

questions.text: Did Sam go to the sexual compulsion group?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	He went there at first denying he had a problem. He also didn't give his real name at first. Then he realized he was addicted to sex.

questions.text: What type of food did Sam ask the woman he had met if she liked?
questions.explanation:
Chinese.

	Even at a sexual compulsion group he managed to hit on someone. Sam was going to be in this group for awhile as we saw later when he guest starred on "Frasier".
